text: Toto shali eshimanyisio khwinywe olwa emikanda chibili chiabukanana okhulwaana. Omukanda mulala nikulwanilanga khunjila ya Nyasaye, ne okundi okwabakhayi, nikubalola abanji muno okhushila bo okhuula khabili, khulwa okhubalola netsimoni. Ne Nyasaye yonganga omukhono owayenya khu buhabini bubwe, Toto mukano khuli nende emeeko khubandu betsimoni
